channel.title: Mr. Malty iOS Yeast Calculator
channel.description: Yeast calculator app uses Mr. Malty's emperically determined yeast calculations to generate target populations for home brewing and professional brewing. Works for any volume, scale, or strength of beer.'.

item.title: Redesign and 30 day sale
item.description: In celebration of the cleaned up UI and lowering the price, for the next 30 days, priced at $1.99, then going to $2.99.

item.title: App available for sale
item.description: Mr. Malty Yeast Calculator for sale!
